services.title: MailBin
services.description: Disposable email inbox for testing. Receive emails instantly without registration.

services.title: PostBin
services.description: Inspect HTTP requests. Perfect for webhook testing and API development.

services.title: FileBin
services.description: Temporary file storage. Share files that auto-delete after 24 hours.

services.title: Webhook Tester
services.description: Test your webhook integrations with real-time request inspection.

services.title: Mocky HTTP
services.description: Create custom HTTP API mocks with configurable responses, methods, and status codes. Perfect for testing and development.

services.title: Data Generator
services.description: Generate realistic test data including SSN, credit cards, routing numbers, and more.
